name: Buffalowgal
review: My go to color is Natural but this color is hard to find so when I do find it, I stock up.

name: Trisha The Esthetician
review: Lip liner for long term wear

name: Dar
review: The best lip liner I have come across.

name: Elly
review: the color was pretty but it was very low quality

name: Conacon
review: Used this lip liner for years and love it.

name: Rebecca
review: Use it as a natural looking lipstick

name: Dosido
review: Use it every day that i wear lipstick

name: diximom
review: I love this lip liner.  It's the only one I'll use.

name: Leslie
review:
I have used many different lip liners and allot of them don't stay on and don't really outline
your lips at all. These stay on and help keep your lipstick in the line without bleeding.
Love the nude color for everyday basic color.

name: Jen
review: Excellent Lip Liner.  Looks amazing.

name: China mom
review: Everyone is impressed with how perfect the color is and how it stays on !

name: Ruth
review: Hard to find the color.  Rosa Rosa

name: Halacious Hawaiian
review: I have used this lip liner for years now.  I see no reason to switch brands.  This one stays on all day and matches my skin tone.

name: Ms. Penny
review: Nothing special. The search for the perfect lip liner continues. Use it everyday but would prefer to find something else for special occassions. this doesnt seem to last very long. Not sure if a primer would help but alone...just ok.

name: lorianne
review: this color was the perfect nude and it lasted all day!

name: Blondie
review: I love this product, and have been using it for years.  I do have a difficult time finding the color "Brown" which I prefer.  I use a light to medium shade of pink mauve gloss as a lip filler, and love the look.  I have tried other lip liners, but they are too thick, too dark, too soft and don't work as well.  This liner helps to keep your lip's shape and keeps your gloss from feathering.

name: Conacon
review: I've been using this lip liner for years and I would never use another brand. I love the color "Plum".

name: Amy
review: This one lasts nicely, yet is not as dry as most pencils.

name: Maggiemaehem
review: Hands down, my favorite red lip liner - and I must not be alone, because it can be hard to find!

name: CoopersMimi2010
review: This lipliner is great and keeps the lipstick from migrating into the fine lines around my lips.

name: sparkle
review: Love this pencil!

name: Franny
review: Color part of the pencil breaks easily & color does not match cover.

name: Don't have one
review: The Cons and Best Uses for this product do not match the product?????

name: wheelchere
review: It wasnt awful but it was barely just ok

name: Kymh1964
review: The nude goes with any lip stick/gloss color.

name: Peg the Golfer
review: I find it very convenient to use and it lasts as long as my lipstick.

name: Motongever
review: This is a good stuff! I bought it as a lipliner and ended up using it as a lip filler. I love the blush color so much, it gives me a pinkish nude effect. Definitely buying it again. :)

name: Linda C
review: I have been using the pink liner for years now. I love it so much that I will pay almost anything for it and stock up with as many as I can find in the store. I always worry they might discontinue it. It goes on so smoothly and is the perfect complement to a number of lipsticks I use.

name: Susan
review: Love this product and color. Goes on easy and even and stays on well. Looks good on its own or under a lipstick.

name: Frosty blonde
review: This lip liner hardly shows up.

name: GrammyD
review: I like that this product lasts. The convenient attached sharpener ensures you get a precision line. It enhances the shape of my lips, especially now that mine are shrinking at my ripe age LOL. I only wish the shade were darker...there used to be a darker shade that I liked "Vixen". I would also prefer it to be a little creamier.

name: dj
review: The tip broke immediately, I think it was dried out because I also bought another one for the eyes and it did the same thing.  I returned both.

name: Deb
review: I use this everyday before I put on my lipstick or gloss.It stays in place.

name: Libby
review: enjoy using it everyday as needed

name: Sassy
review: I watched a makeup expert demonstrate proper use of a lip liner and wanted to try the technique myself. I didn't want to invest a lot of money in a liner. The Revlon ColorStay worked perfectly. It lasted pretty well and didn't feather.

name: LAD
review: Easy to apply and wears well.

name: makeupmom
review: I've used this lip liner for years. My favorite. Both the lip liner and eye liner come with a built in sharpener on the bottom. Best lip liner I've ever used. Hope it never gets discontinued as beauty products tend to do.

name: Tina
review: I love Revlon lip liners because they are true to color and last all day.

name: makeupmom
review: I use the Natural shade. Love it. Use everyday for years. Hope Revlon doesn't discontinue ever.

name: Haley
review:
I don't have anything bad to say about it. It did what it was supposed to and was long-lasting!

I'd recommend to a friend if she asked =)

name: JJ
review: This is my second purchase...as noted in my survey, I like all aspects of the product.  My one wish would be that it would be an actual pencil instead of the mechanical pencil.  Not near enough product in the mechanical pencil and I can't tell when it is close to being used up.

name: None
review: The color I chose was too light for a lip liner. I need to go darker.

name: Beautyluvr26
review: I got the color rose to match the HD matte liquid lipcolor in embrace. It was good while it lasted but the sharpener at the end of the pencil kept on breaking off the tip towards the end. I was disappointed.

name: Sassycirce
review: Terrific Lip Liner.  Recommend it highly.

name: Emilee
review: I don't really wear lipliner but this stuff was decent and a fair price

name: LaLa
review: The color stay line is usually awesome but this is a miss. It barely goes on and doesn't last past first coffee!

name: Gail
review: It stays sharp.  Its easy to use.

name: Jag
review: Love this lip liner. I have oily skin and it keeps my lipstick from running all day, until I remove it at night.

name: LauraH
review: This is my go to liner because it is the longest lasting one that I have ever tried. I just wish they offered a pinky- nude...which is my favorite liner color. The lighter colors in the line do not well on my skin tone. My favorite is nude which is a brownish color. The little built in sharpener comes in very handy too!

name: Ray Ray
review: I use it everyday and it stay on all day

name: Aurora
review: Use this product with the Revlon color stay overtime lip color.  Works great.

name: Grace
review: I'm on the hunt for a great lip liner in a very specific shade. I ordered this one online, figuring that the shade "natural" would probably work for me. In reality, it's more of a sparkly pink and looks horrible on me. The formula is dry and the liner breaks easily if you aren't careful. This one might be a miss compared to other shades in the range, but I don't plan to spend my money trying them out.

name: Alexa
review: It's extremely hard to apply and doesn't last long.

name: picky
review: Bought this bc it was recommended to go with lipstick that I purchased, but it turned out to be a bad color for me.

name: AmandaJ
review: As a beginner with lip colors, I have tested many products, but always find myself using and liking the brands you can buy at the drugstore. This lip liner is my go to- great color selection, easy to apply, easy to remove, and doesn't dry out!

name: Andrea
review: This lipliner emphasizes all the lines in your lips and makes them look truly dry. It drags on the lips and is extremely difficult to apply.

name: Ann
review: I have light brown/olive skin and this is the perfect neutral shade for me. Not too pink and not too brown. I have bought it over and over and over and over again! It is my number one go-to everyday liner. It stays on a long time, but is a little dry. I think it pairs very well with the Revlon Super Lustrous Lipstick in Brazilian Tan.

name: Caregiver Carol
review: Colorstay Lip Liner glides on easily.  I doesn't smear like some other brands do, and it stays on for many hours.  There are great color choices, but natural is my favorite.  It prevents my lipstick from feathering without being an obvious outline.  The pencils are generous, too.  They last a long time even with daily use.

name: E
review: I have always used Revlon products. But lately the eye and pencil liners are dry and break before I even have to twist up! I tried putting the "stick" back into the applicator but it never works right. Not convenient to return so I am stuck. Twice is enough for me.

name: Sher
review: Long lasting and stays put

name: Red
review: Absolutely my favorite product. I wish Revlon hadn't discontinued the original Colorstay lipstick , which is still my all time favorite go to lipstick.

name: Suzi47
review: Sienna lip liner is a perfect match to my "Spice" lipstick. Liner gives my lips definition. Blends perfectly with my lipstick color - no lip liner/lip color separation.

name: Ruby
review: I choose the wrong color

name: none
review: I like the color and the way it self sharpens.

name: Piano lady
review:
I fill my TOTAL lips and then apply my lipstick. This way my lipstick can last for many hours.
I have contacted Revlon about the irregularities in the color. When it is the correct shade it is beautiful

name: Karen o
review: Like it

name: MN
review: This is one of the only lip liners I own. It's a simple color and matches really well with my nude lipsticks.

name: kurlygurl51
review: Awful! It crumbles, is very dry, doesn't go on smoothly at all - it's going back.

name: Karen
review: I use this product every day.  I would buy it again.

name: Jayc
review: Works great!  Holds other lip color in place for long periods of time.

name: Meg
review: I use it everyday

name: Just a gitl
review: Used for what I thought would be a one time use thing. But now I'm looking for ways to incorporate this product into my everyday life. In the past, I always had to re-apply several time over a short period of time. With this product When I checked, I found I didn't have the need to!

name: Mrs
review: I use this product at least twice a day

name: Rita
review: Like the true color & applies evenly.   Nice point on liner & does not break off when using.

name: linda
review: On my lips under my lipstick.

name: Missyhardt
review: I was not impressed with this liner.  It doesn't go on very smoothly and the tip crumbled off the first time I used it. The color on the cap looked to be a matte nude, but it's actually a shimmery shade.  The only plus was that once I got it on it seemed to last well.

name: Sarah J
review: I really can't decide if I like it or not. Some days it works great for me, others not so much. Good days it covers nicely, goes on smoothly and easily, stays put and prevents bleed. Other days it makes my lips look strangely chapped and sparkly orange- not really what I was going for.

name: Mermaids_tear
review: I am fair- medium neutral skin tone, this shade was my exact lip color. It was totally invisible on my mouth. That's actually what I WANTED  to go with my lipglosses. I HAVE UNEVEN LIPS, and this product helped correct the problem without looking like I have overdrawn lip liner. I love it.

name: Ro
review: This lip liner is ok. Not creamy enough for me. Tugs at lip when applying.

name: CK
review: Use this liner with several different colors. Very neutral

name: GG
review: Nude color blends well with a variety of lipcolors so you don't have to have liners in every shade

name: Linda
review: I needed a great lipliner for stage performance use. This did the trick!!

name: samsula123
review: Makes all my lipstick look that much better! And makes it last so much longer! Love the color!

name: busy homeschooling mom
review: This product was long lasting, went on smoothly and is a great price.

name: Mary
review: Love the wearability

name: T
review: Bought this in "wine" color and I love it! Just recently purchased a nice wine-colored red lipstick and this lipliner complements it well. It is also not too dramatic of a color so it fits with my skin color.

name: Jo
review: Good product for the price.

name: Realtor
review: I've been using this for as long as I can remember - haven't really tried anything else, so can't compare it.  But I love it - it works - creates the lip definition I am looking for, and keeps color from bleeding into any lip lines.

name: Bonnie
review: only lipliner I will use

name: Hello Kitty Fan
review: I have tried may lip liners & this is by far the best.  Soft tip of pen like applicator makes getting the line you want very easy.

name: April
review: If I use this lip liner ,and color in my entire lip it will last all day !!! And of coarse I put my favorite lipstick over it.. I could sleep in it and eat a full meal and it's still on !!! I always use the nude one and every color lipstick looks good over it.

name: moshi
review: Great product for a little price.  The telescoping pencil is good packaging.  In fact I think this may be the same packaging style that Bare Escentuals used when they had a group of lip liners I also liked.  Since they don't make their product any longer, this is a good transition and no messy sharpening required!

name: JennBunny
review: The color last long.  I was only disappointed with how dark this color was.

name: Mumzy
review: This product does exactly what it states it will do. Long lasting and defining, it is also a great value.

name: Sissy
review:
The color is as stated, the twist-up container is great, but it goes on clumpy & dry. It doesn't stay on very long at all.
I use this as a base, then put a nude-pink liner over it, then lipstick or gloss, which makes it useable.

name: Perfectionist
review: It goes on smoothly and stays on all day, even after eating.

name: joie
review: I love this lip liner.  It is among the best ones out there.

name: Debra
review: Great liner, never needs sharpening and it's so smooth.

name: GiGi
review: This is my favorite lip liner that I have used for years.....I can't go without it..a must have!

name: Aure
review: This lipliner is great to fill in your lips with before applying lipstick as it gives the perfect base to keep it from feathering and to increase wear.

name: English Lady
review:
I have been using it now for a couple of years, just saw it one day price was right and gave it a try. I would not change for all the tea in China. I am an older lady that had lipstick that would bleed out of my lip-line, I am blessed to have found this. I use the NUDE, the price is pretty darn good.
I must add to this, that I also use the eye-liner as well, it is the BEST........I wear the Brown......again you could not get me to change.
By the way I used to work in a high priced department store in Cosmetics...........selling all those overpriced cosmetics......here's a laugh.......I never used them, would go to a Drugstore and buy my Revlon. One last thing I have now got my daughter using the same products I use, we both really love !

name: Robin
review: Stays on really well. Lipstick doesn't bleed when using this

name: Ledbetter 2
review: I've used several other more expensive brands of lip liners.  This is the one I always go back to.  I can usually get it anywhere.  That's a bonus when I'm traveling.

name: lips
review: Using the product before applying lipstick keeps the lipstick from running into the lip wrinkles. Works great.

name: Happy Shopper
review: I have been using this brand for many years.   You can't beat the price and it stays on, does not migrate.  Works just as well as the $21.00 ones.  There is also a good selection of colors.

name: Married in NC
review: I love the Revlon lip liners but they do not keep the colors you like such as: Plum

name: debz
review: I use this lip liner everyday. It coordinates nicely with my lipstick helps it last longer.

name: 22beauty
review: Great liner and filler for all lip shades and all lip colors.

name: Rita
review: A great liner that prevents your lip color from bleeding.  Easy to use and blends well.

name: Sonya
review: Love the long wear!  I hate constant reapplying, and don't have to with this low price liner.

name: Nona
review: I use this daily, as I love to wear makeup and look my best.  It lasts the whole day until I take it off.  Sometimes it goes on clumpy if I have put powder on my lips first.

name: Staying Young
review: Use everyday. Sometimes wears alone with a little lip balm

name: L. Szuis
review: blends well,great with just lip gloss

name: Happy
review: I rely on my lipliner to prevent feathering and bleeding.  Revlon lipliner does a pretty good job but could be improved in that regard.  Also, would like to have an automatic point without having to sharpen but I will settle for this product as it has done well for me for over 3 years.

name: carol
review: I first use a tiny bit of lip moisturizer so that the liner goes on very smoothly and then fill in the lip then use a lip brush to even it out.

name: Mary the nitpicker
review: I use this product to outline my lips before putting on my lipstick. After OUTLINING the lipline  I then use a lipliner brush to apply my lipstick ON the lipline. This helps in keeping my lipstick within my lip line without it 'feathering'.

name: jenny1965
review: Great product very natural and easy application!!!! Highly recommend:)

name: Kay
review:
Love to put it on as a base coat under a similar color lipstick. Poor color selection means I can't use it by itself, and if the lipstick color is close, it's a good liner. It helps keep the color from bleeding.
I recently returned one to exchange it for another because the applicator had tiny slivers of sharp plastic that were as long as the liner itself, and scratched my lips when I tried to apply it. Just a cheap container, I guess. Wish there were more colors. Ulta had only two more liners, both a brown kind of color. I like the coral and the sienna/ochre.

name: LouLou
review:
I have this pencil in wine. It applies smoothly and holds up well. This is one of my favorite pencils.
(I also bought the pencil in pink, and that color contains shimmer and doesn't perform nearly as well. The pink was a disappointment!)

name: lndasmile
review: Love the nuetral color for lining my lips- not to dark not to light

name: Tara
review: This is my go to liner, lasts as long or longer than the higher priced ones. I usually am a faithful UD or twoface user but always go back to this liner.

name: Paula
review: I've been using this lip liner for several years now, and I've not yet found one I like better. I use it with lip balm as my lipstick, as a liner, and to add to other lip color applications when I buy an off color. It's long-wearing, glides on smoothly and evenly, and blends nicely. Always a staple in my makeup bag!

name: shoiley
review: I like a lip liner the does not need to be sharpened and one that is soft enough be applied comfortably.  Some pencils actually hurt because they are so  hard.

name: SM
review: I use this as an everyday anytime wear to give my lips some color and fill it in with a lighter gloss.

name: Aimee
review: Not pigmented at all. Worst liner over used

name: Ab
review: I use this liner with a matte lipstick, and it stays on longer than the lipstick.

name: Nan
review: This lipliner is easy to apply, and stays on . I use it in place of lipstick. After applying, I use lipgloss.

name: Amber the Unimpressed
review: I use this with a Revlon Colorstay Ultimate Suede in Fashionista and it blends beautifully. It stays well.

name: kurlygurl51
review: Ugh - crumbly, dry, won't go on smoothly - hated it.

name: Andrea
review: Have tried them all and for the price this is my favorite

name: got2luvgolf
review: I like this lip liner but I would love it if it stayed on longer.  I was expecting longer wear considering it is "color stay."  Its a great liner though that glides on smooth for an easy application.  I would probably buy again just because I don't think there is anything on the market that is better.  I have tried several brands and I have high expectations.

name: Norene
review:
I like the smoothness of the soft tip applicator and how it turns up to how much you want the tip exposed. It flows on nice and smooth. It is a much neater application than a hard liner pencil.
The one downfall is for the price I wish there were more pencil in the case.

name: Dancing Queen
review: DIfficult to apply

name: Susie Q
review: I use it every morning and anytime I want to redo my lipstick or lipgloss.

name: Rita
review: I bought  a natural color to use with lipsticks to stop lip color bleeding and this does a great job!  Love it!!

name: Mickie
review: Love this lip liner and that it does not need sharpening.

name: tad
review: I have been using the ColorStay liner for 20 years! I love it and have not been able to find another lip liner that I like better. Mauve is my favorite color. Even though it is a little pricey, you can wait for the coupons or get buy one/get another 50% off.

name: AZrealtor
review: Great color.  Nice consistency.  stays put, doesn't slide around.  Inexpensive.

name: Rita
review: I use this product and know that I will not have bleeding lip color.  It is great.

name: Paula
review: The Revlon lip liner is the best I have ever used. I've tried other brands but always come back to this long lasting, stay put, liner.

name: Les
review: It does not glide on at all. I found myself going over and over my lips to get some color on them. The pencil was very dry and does not apply easy.

name: M&M
review: I put the liner on my lips then a little gloss for an easy sophisticated but natural look. Great for a day and night time lip. Love the liner!

name: Little Red
review: This has pretty good staying power, but the nude shade I bought was way too dark.  I'd hardly call it nude.  Bummer.

name: MakeUpByNazely
review: Umm, Its okay. Its just a lipliner there isnt much i can say. Not a fan of the color that much...i got a grandma look afterwards.

name: Katrina
review: I bought this product because this brand of lip liner received a best rating from Paula's Choice Cosmetics Cops team.  It is my go-to for lip liners and prevents my lip color from bleeding.

name: mini guru
review: They're not kidding when they say natural. Blends in perfect with my natural lip color! Can hardly even tell unless you look. This helps my lipstick last longer and helps me stay in the lines. Also love the mini sharpener at the bottom!

name: Michelle
review: I found a color that I loveand hope they don't discontinue

name: Damienized
review: I usually wear this as base for my lipstick UD Rush. I feel it makes it stay on longer. I've used it as a base with brighter and darker colors than Rush, just not lighter.

name: Nera
review:
I bought this today in the color Pink/Rose and was so excited to try it. I opened it from a new package and began to apply -- tip instantly broke off. Okay, so I tried again. Tip broke off again. This happened 4 times consecutively until I was able to get a semi-decent application. I should add that I was applying it gently as well, out of the initial fear I WOULD break it! I tried it again a few hours later (maybe my hand was just too heavy, you know?) and no, it still broke.

The color is beautiful and after I did get it on, it was very long-lasting, but the difficulty and mess in applying just turned me off.

name: dc
review: nice product and colors

name: LH
review: I love this lip pencil as it stays on for a long time and always has a nice small point for detail application.

name: em
review: I have used this product everyday for a couple of years. It lasts 2-3 months.  I love that it does not bleed and really defines my lips

name: Patty
review: Daily

name: Bebe
review: It goes great with a few colors. I've been looking for a good "rose" liner and am very pleased with this one.

name: Sali
review: It goes great with my red or purple lipsticks.

name: Radgurl
review: This lip liner is really good I use it everyday! My favorite is chocolate it's a perfect dupe for MAC chestnut liner!

name: shaylapurple16
review: I have this liner in Wine and I am really satisfied with it! I wear it most frequently under the Revlon Matte Really Red lipstick and Kate Moss 107. It's smooth and lasts all day, and I haven't had problems with it breaking off or being dry. It really does make a difference in helping the lipsticks on top of it last longer, I would love to get more in different colors!

name: SolaraJ
review: Purchased three liner pencils, in three shades.  One was darker than it appeared, but the other colors were perfect.  I am 70, and my lips are now uneven, so I use these to even them out.  Stays on better than other liners I have tried.  Will use these.

name: Senior lady
review:
I have bought this lip liner several times.
Stays on as good as any. Looks natural if you choose right color.

name: Sjomohr
review: I use it every day. It stays all day long without reapplying. It looks completely natural. I hate the feel of lipstick and this has no "feel". Love it!!! I have used it for years.

name: Sjomohr
review: I use it everyday. It has a completely natural look, staying on all day long. No "goop" on my lips. It's dry to apply but doesn't leave that goopy feel lipstick gives, which I hate.

name: Paula
review: I have used this Cover Girl lip liner for years. It's the best. I've tried others but always come back to Cover Girl lip liner.

name: Susan D.
review: This is a great liner.  It goes on smoothly and has great color.

name: Rita
review: Is a great product for a natural lip liner, works well to stop lip stick bleed!

name: lavarox
review: liner goes on smoothly. stays on pretty well.

name: Sandra
review: Highly recommend...I have been buying this product for several years.

name: Janna Belle
review: It works well for what it is.  Goes on the way you want it to and the colors are true.

name: Susie
review: I love the lip liner--has great colors, seems to stay on for quite awhile and is reasonable-even though I would like it to be a larger pencil liner that would last longer.I use alot of these pencil liners-

name: Naturalstyler
review: This lip liner is too dry to use.  Pulls on lips and doesn't go on easy at all.  Got the nude and expected to see a smooth line, but all I got was a clumpy dry product that ended up on lips.  Don't bother.

name: shibish4
review: Rose color is brightening on my skin tone.

name: Gin
review: Need a matching lipstick.

name: Mom
review: This product is great. I outline my lips with it then i use it to color insides and middle of my lips to make the lipstick of your choice stay on longer. It makes your lipstick look flawless and perfectly lined.

name: Martha
review: I think the product would be ok, but the color wasn't right for me.

name: Teresa
review: It is a good product.

name: Kluttstm
review: I love this re long lip liner. The mauve color goes with all of my lip stick colors. Dark and light. It is long lasting too.

name: Vivian
review: I wanted a lip liner easy to work with but that it will stay and this one does it for me. Really like it

name: Rockie_lovee
review: It goes perfectly with any and everything ... It matches your lip tone if you have brown lips like mine ... It gives it that little touch to make the details of your lips pop more than anything

name: Red Lip Lover
review: I like to use my lip liner as a full lipstck since good lip liners seem to last much longer than actual lipsticks. I had read good reviews about this product, but when I got home and applied this lip liner (in color Red) the liner wiped off almost immediately. It did not apply evenly and pulled my lips as I put it on. I like the ease of being able to sharpen it and twist the liner up and down in its container, but that seems to be the only good thing about this product. Really disappointed that the color does not last.

name: Mizar
review: allows a smooth easy line

name: Minnie
review: Color was too dark compared to online color. Not enough light or true red, orange.. More bright colors would be nice.

name: JK
review: I use lip liner around the edge of my lips to prevent bleeding or feathering.

name: Crystal
review: I like that it's not a pencil that you have to sharpen.

name: Erin
review: Perfect with Revlon Black Cherry lipstick! A perfect trendy oxblood shade.

name: marcy
review: It goes on smooth.

name: MMU
review: I have used this product since it was introduced and I will continue to use it.

name: Jen
review: I've only tried the ColorStay liner in Red, but I like it very much. It's very long-wearing and true to color, but it is a bit drying. I suggest applying a thin layer of lip balm before using the liner, and then apply the liner quickly before it sets, otherwise it tends to gunk up when adding subsequent layers. Other than that, I like this product.

name: Txladywriter
review: I use the lip liner when getting ready for work in the morning, and after eating/drinking... gives such a polished line and helps visually to "plump out" and define my lips, which are unfortunately not as full as they were a few years ago.... Definitely a boost!

name: Kathy, mom of twins
review: Nice colors. Goes on smooth, though it might drag a little over dry lips. It's long-lasting and works great as a base for a long-lasting lipstick.

name: Tina
review: I'm a senior and as you age, your lip line seems to deminish.  This product works great and I have suggested it to friends, and they also like the results.

name: Mperk
review: Nice finish to lip color.

name: makeup fan
review: I love the colorstay brand of Revlon.  The colors last all day. My only con is if it is not applied evenly before using the colorstay ultimate suede lipsticks than it can give a "spotty" look.  Overall though, I love these lipliners.

name: Diane
review: As lipliner is meant to be used

name: Natalie cat
review: I use this to line lips before applying lipstick.  This color is very good and it stays actually longer than my lipstick does.  It is creamy and goes on easily.  I will definitely buy again, and will look for other colors to match lipsticks.

name: MS
review: Color said Choc but it is a reddish brown not what I was looking for!

name: JG
review: I used it as soon as I bought it and the tip fell off. Didn't seem like the product moves quickly off the shelf and was old.

name: Happy Shopper
review: I have been using this for years, it's a reasonable price and stays on.  I tried the more expensive department store brands and they didn't last on me.  I use the sienna color and it goes with most of my lipstick colors other than the pink tones.

name: Katrina
review: Helps keep lipstick (especially reds) from bleeding around the mouth.

name: bitsthebaker
review:
This is hands down the pest lipliner available, and believe me I've tried most. Revlon offers a good variety of colors to match nearly any lipstick one might use.

This is the longest lasting and the easiest lipliner product I've ever used. Lipliners are meant to help hold lipstick in place for increased wear time and keep lipstick from sliding all over the place; that is exactly what this product does. it is not creamy/smeary, shimmery, or glossy in anyway and that is a good thing! As long as you don't wind it up to far it shouldn't break. It glides on smoothly and evenly with good color payoff. Definitely recommend, mauve and pink are my favorite.

name: Sjomohr
review: Used this product for decades. Natural color. Long lasting. Not gooey. Why change? It's perfect.

name: Picky lips
review: Great liner, long lasting

name: GG
review: I have been using this product for a long time.  It goes on easily and stays.

name: Silver Sterling
review: Been using this lip liner for years. The Nude shade is great with almost sll shades of lipstick. I like most of the Color Stay products.
